00008 void OR1DHistoHistogramsDecoder::Swap(UInt_t* dataRecord)
00009 {
00010   if(LengthOf(dataRecord)<2) return;
00011 
00012   /* Swapping everything but the title. */
00013   ORUtils::Swap(dataRecord[1]);
00014   for(size_t iWord=2+NKeyWordsOf(dataRecord);iWord<LengthOf(dataRecord);iWord++) {
00015     ORUtils::Swap(dataRecord[iWord]);
00016   }
00017 }

00019 std::string OR1DHistoHistogramsDecoder::KeysOf(UInt_t* record) 
00020 { 
00021   std::string keys((char*)(record + 2), NKeyCharactersOf(record));
00022   return keys;
00023 }

00026 size_t OR1DHistoHistogramsDecoder::NKeysOf(UInt_t* record)
00027 {
00028   size_t keyLength = NKeyCharactersOf(record);
00029   std::string keys = KeysOf(record);
00030   size_t nKeys = 1;
00031   for(size_t i=0; i<keyLength; i++) {
00032     if(keys[i] == '/') nKeys++;
00033   }
00034   return nKeys;
00035 }
00036 
00037 std::string OR1DHistoHistogramsDecoder::IthKeyOf(UInt_t* record, size_t iKey)
00038 {
00039   size_t currentIKey=0;
00040   size_t iStart = 0;
00041   std::string keys = KeysOf(record);
00042   while(currentIKey<iKey) {
00043     if(keys[iStart] == '/') currentIKey++;
00044     iStart++;
00045   }
00046   size_t iStop = iStart;
00047   while(iStop < NKeyCharactersOf(record) && keys[iStop] != '/') iStop++;
00048   std::string key;
00049   for(size_t i=iStart; i<iStop; i++) key.push_back(keys[i]);
00050   return key;
00051 }
